decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( KHYYAM/PLAN01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07 and 08 received on 13 April 2016  and Acoustic Assessment of Noise (Doc ref: 021617 rev A) received on 15 July 2016. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The proposal shall be implemented in accordance with the Acoustic Assessment of Noise (Doc ref: 021617 rev A) received on 15 July 2016.
Condition : 5 - The seating area hereby approved shall not be used by customers other than between the hours of 11:00 and 23:00.
Condition : 6 - Customers shall not be allowed access to the external areas to the side or rear of the application property at any time.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to be used as seating for restaurant
